message.body: So far, my whole Monday is free! Whatcha wanna do, pretty lady?
Excellent! I'm flying in from PA that morning and am taking the day off, but have a dentist appt in the afternoon :( Maybe dinner?
That is totally doable! Any restaurant preference?
I have lots of favorite vegan friendly places in ######!! ;) we can pick a place once we meet up and see what we feel like!
Sounds good! Plus, I'm sure you'll have lots of good stuff between now and then. Have fun and let's get back in touch on Monday!
Awesome, have fun in pa, ladylove!!
Holy crap, I JUST NOW got your voicemail about the ride from the airport. So sorry!!
It's all good my dear!! I got picked up just fine ;)
